Title: Tell It to the Frogs
Writer: Frank Darabont (developed by), Robert Kirkman (series of graphic novels), Tony Moore (series of graphic novels), Charlie Adlard (series of graphic novels), Charles H. Eglee (teleplay by), Jack LoGiudice (teleplay by), Frank Darabont (teleplay by), Charles H. Eglee (story by), Jack LoGiudice (story by)
Actors: Andrew Lincoln, Jon Bernthal, Sarah Wayne Callies, Laurie Holden
Plot: Rick is reunited with Lori and Carl but soon decides - along with some of the other survivors - to return to the rooftop and rescue Merle. Meanwhile, tensions run high between the other survivors at the camp.
